sentence: The only frustration was being stuck in a conferences room and not able to enjoy all the facilities
Money better spent any of the other 1000s of venues Dubai has to offer
I called 4 days ahead of time to book a meeting room since I could not do it through the website unlike other hotels and I could not reach anyone cause they were off hotels should be available 247
We are staying in rooms 204 206 which are accessible from the main corridor by one door which opens on to a small foyer which has 2 doors leading off to each bedroom
Went for an event in the ballroom so did not really see much of the hotel
The breakout area was conveniently situated to exhibitors so it was not a scramble to visit the stands and grab a bite between sessions
We could not get a pool sea view room and so our rooms at the back of the hotel were a little disappointing and would recommend asking for rooms nearer the central atrium
The four seasons boasts a fantastic dining and night life scene and we were not disappointed with food quality or service at any of the venues
And i have a meeting to go to so i took a taxi
The attendant call button machines did not function on any day during my stay so you have to call out or get up to request service which is a little inconvenient but not a big deal
I came all the way from Singapore to Dubai to have a business meeting in four seasons hotel 2 days ago
The room was spacious but the shower did not function if you did n’t want to use the rain head shower which was very frustrating

Side activities for kidsSanta Claus visited the hotel on Dec 25th and I have to say that I am still positively surprised by this event – I will not share any « secret » here but Santa Claus arrival at the Four Seasons hotel is one of those memory we will keep in mind for a very long time … Kids loved it but adults also
If u go for an event parking is easy but getting it bacl can be a Nightmare
I had a meeting at hotel lobby
Was only there for a meeting will return for dinner or might stay at the hotel
The room had a little foyer entry which gave some privacy away from the corridor
Apt for small n big functions
I did n’t take pictures of the hotel itself but here are some from the conference
My room faced a venue disco that emitted a LOT of noisewel into the late night even the first hours of the morning
I have my meetings at the four seasons hotel
They gave us a room above the ballroom and it ’s now 130AM and the party in the ballroom is loud and noisy
